posts.title: The Ins and Outs of the Child Care Tax Credit
posts.summary: If you are paying someone to take care of your children or another person in your household while you work, you might be eligible for the child and dependent care credit. This credit gives back a portion of the money you spend on care, and can reduce your tax bill by hundreds or even thousands of dollars.
